animeDescription: Sent to a strange world, a young boy must team up with monsters, becoming one with them to battle evil.
animeStaff: [['Iwanami Yoshikazu', ['Sound Director']], ['Tomita Sukehiro', ['Script']], ['Nanba Hitoshi', ['Storyboard']], ['Katsu Seiji', ['Theme Song Performance', 'Theme Song Composition']]]
